metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1998 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use after free in the Linux kernel File System notify functionality was found in the way user triggers copy_info_records_to_user() call to fail in copy_event_to_user(). A local user could use this flaw to crash the system or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.
